modName: Magic Hairstyles Aela and Serana Makeovers
summary: High quality NPC makeovers for anyone who doesn't want another photocopied anime girl. Includes two spells that gives them 11 hairstyles for each character ingame, YAY.
descriptionHtml:
[color=orange][font=cENTURY gOTHIC][b][size=6]About[/size][/b][/font] [/color]

[center]Posting my last NPC makeover files. This is for someone who wants high quality NPC makeovers, but can't find any that don’t look like anime waifus. [color=#ff7700][b]Hairs are customizable in-game[/b][/color] and range from lore-friendly to darn cute.[/center]

[center]Everything is standalone! No need to install more files.
Aela has CNHF and Serana has default UNP bodies. Click [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/articles/50409/?]HERE[/url] to learn how to change the meshes.[/center]
 
 
 
[center]There are spells immediately added to in game located in the Illusion School. Just shoot the matching spell to Serana or Aela and there you
go. =) If for some reason you aren't getting the spell, type in the console [color=orange][b]help hairstyles[/b][/color] and you will find the spell IDs. Then type in [color=orange]player.addspell INSERTIDHERE[/color][/center]
 
[center] Play tested on new game saves and nothing wrong so far found. Is compatible with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48470/?]the Hairstyler[/url]. Just make sure that my follower’s hair are set
at DEFAULT. Otherwise Hairstyler wigs are a no show.[/center]
 
[center]No,I won’t add more characters or hair. Read [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/articles/50409/?]HERE[/url]  on how to change the hair meshes.

If you’d like to post a mod translation or a body adaptation, feel free to do so (just notify me).[/center]

[color=orange][font=cENTURY gOTHIC][b][size=6]Credits[/size][/b][/font] [/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url] by Hthot
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48470/?]Hairstyler[/url] Scripts which I copied off from
SG Hairs by Hello Santa
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/105298/?tb=feed&pUp=1]Anaphiel[/url]’s custom face and body textures. This is a mashup consisting resources from Nuska, Xenius, Betterbecause, Zonzai Real Girls, etc
Improved Eyes Skyrim by misjennabee
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22619/?]Underworld Dawnguard Eyes[/url]
CNHF 2.5 and Dimon UNP Bodies
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38829/?]BVFE Fangs[/url]
Racemenu and Enhanced Character Edit
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30179/?]Better Hand Mesh UNP[/url]
author: Beans
